title: (1) Hamburg: View from the Alsterglacis towards the Lombardsbrücke with Büsch Monument in Foreground, Spire of the Georgkirche Seen across the Aussenalster (Left) and Jacobikirche and Petrikirche Seen across the Binnenalster (Right); (2) Similar View
credits: Accepted by the nation as part of the Turner Bequest 1856
